title: Fed's Williams Says Cuts Have Brought Risks Into Better Balance
description: Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams says interest rates are “well positioned” to stabilize the labor market and bring inflation back to the central bank’s 2% goal during a Council on Foreign Relations event in New York. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams says interest rates are “well positioned” to stabilize the labor market and bring inflation back to the central bank’s 2% goal during a Council on Foreign Relations event in New York. (Source: Bloomberg)
